content: the viridescent table runner is a fun project that works up nice and fast it will make for a beautiful display on your table for any special occasion or even all year round if you haven t yet tried overlay mosaic crochet this is a great way to join in on the fun being a repeat runner this gives you the option to customize the length it uses us terminology and is worked from the bottom up skill level - easy this pattern does not have step-by-step photo tutorials **material list ** * yarn weight acrylic/cotton blend 4ply * hook size 3mm * masking tape & scissors for making straight edges on tassels * needle for securing row 1 tail * stitch markers optional the pattern is totally adaptable to suit any yarn type and create any table runner length you will find the stitch diagram for the table runner in a separate download you are more than welcome to work the table runner in any yarn of your choice however depending on the yarn and gauge you may have a size difference visit our facebook group for pattern support and other info https //www facebook com/groups/1370975902929963/
